name: Gorgorab

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in the Arena by 23%.

skills.name: Misfortune
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of removing 1 random buff.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Resurge
skills.raw_description:
Fills the Turn Meter of all allies by 15%. Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Animate
skills.raw_description:
Revives any dead allies with 25% HP, then heals all allies by 25%.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
